channel.title: Krim on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Krim on Martin's Blog

item.title: Krim
item.description: Well, that what we were told and that is the knowledge we stuck by. Krim is a 1,107m tall mountain on the southern outskirts of the Ljubljana moors. In all the years I have lived in Slovenia I have never actually been up it. I have been close, but never actually climbed it. Mostly it was because the Yugoslav army and after 1991 the Slovenian arm held a radio-relay station on top of it and access to the area was restricted.
